effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Power is selected at random between 10 and 150, with an average of 71: Magnitude | Power | Chance --------: | ----: | -----: 4 | 10 | 5% 5 | 30 | 10% 6 | 50 | 20% 7 | 70 | 30% 8 | 90 | 20% 9 | 110 | 10% 10 | 150 | 5% This move has double power against Pokémon currently underground due to dig.
